A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sorry lovers of SW. I was at the opening of the very first one\, yes the epic\, perfect film that we all have come to love. I have seen every episode since and\, sadly\, this one killed it for me. There are so many gaping holes in the story\, the script\, the editing.....it is really incredible. Rey is fighting for her life\, and suddenly she is on the Falcon. Ummm....ok\, we’ll give that a pass. Who the heck is this Snoke guy...BTW what a weak name. And Rose...come on. I’ve read all the gushy things on the net but the part is questionable and the execution was awkward/weak. Rey’s purported backstory is a mess and that weird scene when Leila is blown into space and the does the Mary Poppins thing was lame. I could list many more things but am fatigued so will stop here.
